1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, telaj a b'a yed' eb' stelaj sb'a ved'oc, ac' oval yed' eb' tz'ac'an oval ved'oc.</t>
2: <t>Iq'uelta a yamc'ab' yic oval, tzul in a colani.</t>
3: <t>Iq'uelta a lanza tza macan sat eb' tzin pechan b'eyec'oc. Al d'ayin to in Columal ach.</t>
4: <t>A eb' sgana in chami, somchajocab'b'at eb' yuj q'uixvelal. A eb' snib'ej ay tas scot d'a vib'an̈, meltzajocab'b'at eb' d'a spatic.</t>
5: <t>Ichocab' smatz'il ixim trigo syic'b'at ic', ichocab' ta tz'aj eb'. Pechjocab'b'at eb' yuj ángel.</t>
6: <t>Q'uic'olinacocab'i, n̈ereriocab' sb'e eb', axo ángel spechan eb'.</t>
7: <t>Vach'chom malaj in mul, palta ix yaq'uem in yaalil eb'. Malaj in mul, palta ix sjoy jun olan eb' yic vach' tzin b'at d'a yool snaan eb'.</t>
8: <t>Yuj chi', mocab' naanoc yuj eb' ayic sjavi nivac yaelal d'a yib'an̈ eb'. Canocab' eb' d'a syaalil ix yaq'uem chi'. B'atocab'can eb' d'a yol jun olan ix sb'o chi'.</t>
9: <t>Ichato chi' ol vac'an tzalajb'oc in c'ol d'ayach Jehová. Ol el lenaj ol vil yuj a colval.</t>
10: <t>D'a smasanil in c'ool ol val icha tic: Mamin Jehová, ¿machto val junoc icha ach tic? A eb' meb'a' yed' eb' ayoch d'a tzapan majanil, tza colel eb' d'a yol sc'ab' eb' te ay yip, to syiq'uec' eb' tastac ay d'a eb', xin chama.</t>
11: <t>Scot eb' testigo esum, axo tas man̈ vojtacoc sc'anb'ej eb' d'ayin.</t>
12: <t>A in vach'c'olal chuc ix yutej eb' spactzitan d'ayin, ix in stzuntzej cus eb'.</t>
13: <t>A inxo, ayic ya'ay eb', ix vac'och pichul yic cusc'olal, maxtzac in valaj yuj cusc'olal, ya svab'i. Max vactejcanlaj in lesalvi d'a in pixan yuj eb'.</t>
14: <t>Cusnac in c'ool ix in b'eyeq'ui, icha val to a yuj junoc vamigo, ma vuc'tac, ma icha in nun tzin cus yuuj.</t>
15: <t>Ayic ix in telvi, ix q'ue umnaj eb' smasanil in stzetzani. Ichato ch'oc animail in d'a eb', ichato man̈ in yojtacoc eb'. Max yactejcanlaj eb' in ste b'ajani.</t>
16: <t>Te ya ix in ec' yuj eb', ix in sb'uch eb', ix cot q'uelan eb' d'ayin yed' schichonc'olal.</t>
17: <t>Mamin Jehová, ¿tom ton̈ej ol ach och q'uelan yuj jun tic? Colinel d'a yol sc'ab' eb' icha noc' choj, tz'el yav, scot d'ayin.</t>
18: <t>Ol valel yab'ixal a vach'c'olal d'a yichan̈ eb' tzijtumal anima molaneq'ui. Ol val vach' lolonel d'ayach d'a yichan̈ eb' a chon̈ab'.</t>
19: <t>Mocab' tzalaj sc'ool eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin. Mocab' reprepan sat eb' schichon sc'ol d'ayin, vach'chom malaj in mul d'a eb'.</t>
20: <t>Malaj sgana eb' d'a junc'olal. Sgana eb' snaq'ue esal lolonel d'a spatic eb' munil ayeq'ui.</t>
21: <t>Te chaan̈ tz'el yav eb' d'ayin, syalan eb': Ix quil tas ix a c'ulej chi', toxo ix quila', xchi eb'.</t>
22: <t>Mamin, ix il val. Ac' yovalil d'a eb', man̈ ach najatb'ocb'ati, man̈ ach el d'a in tz'ey.</t>
23: <t>Mamin ach Vajal, in Diosal ach, cotan̈, colin, b'o yaj tas sval tic. Ochan̈ ved'oc.</t>
24: <t>Ach Jehová in Diosal ach, b'o yaj d'ayin ato syal a tojolal, in gana to max in tzetzaj yuj eb'.</t>
25: <t>Mocab' yal eb' d'ayin icha tic: Ix elc'och icha co gana. Juneln̈ej ix quixtejcanb'at vin̈, mocab' xchioc eb'.</t>
26: <t>A eb' stzalaj yuj in yaelal, q'uixvocab'can eb', somchajocab'el sc'ool eb'. Q'uixvocab'el eb' nivac vinac syutej sb'a d'a vichan̈.</t>
27: <t>Axo eb' sgana to vach' tzin elc'ochi, tzalajocab' sc'ool eb'. Elocab' yav eb' yuj tzalajc'olal. Yalocab' eb' d'a masanil tiempo: A Jehová, te nivan ton yelc'ochi, stzalaj val yuj svach'il jun schecab' tic, xchiocab' eb'.</t>
28: <t>Mamin, ol valel a tojolal, ol valn̈ej vach' lolonel d'ayach d'a masanil tiempo.</t>
